channel.title: Benad's Web Site
channel.description: Latest updates on Benad's Web Site

item.title: February 12, 2022
item.description: Posts are regularly added to the blog, including a new series about modern CLI tools.

item.title: January 18, 2018
item.description: This site is now using HTTPS and supports IPv6.

item.title: April 26, 2016
item.description: Added The Static Blog, about the relocation of my blog to this site.

item.title: December 6, 2015
item.description: Added the article A Case for Software Architects, where I try to define the software architect role in a software development project.

item.title: June 30, 2014
item.description: Added the article Why Are You A Programmer?, listing humorous stereotypes of the various kind of programmers.

item.title: August 4, 2013
item.description:
This web site is now written in HTML5. More information in the article The Future is HTML5

Also, I corrected countless grammatical errors all over the place, but hopefully nobody noticed.

item.title: June 3, 2012
item.description:
First, my blog moved (again) to the permanent URL blog.benad.me.

Second, I added the article "What is Software Design".

item.title: March 4, 2012
item.description: Since January 2012 I'm posting daily on my Posterous blog.

item.title: October 9, 2010
item.description: Added article ed, or How I Learned To Love The Mouse" and cleaned up the site a bit.

item.title: March 1, 2010
item.description: Completed About This Site - The Present and About This Site - The Future. Hopefully I'll update this site at a faster pace in the following weeks.

item.title: September 3, 2009
item.description: Added the page About This Site - The Past and a (manually crafted, for now) RSS feed.

item.title: August 23, 2009
item.description: Initial release. For now, only the "About Me" section is complete, but at least it's a start.
